bibl.title: The Chester Beatty Codex Ac. 1390. Mathematical School Exercises in Greek and John 10:7-13:38 in Subachmimic. (Chester Beatty Monographs. 13.)
bibl.note: Pp. 1-32: Introduction (by J.M.R.): 1. The Pachomian Library, 2. The Acquisition by the Chester Beatty Library, 3. A Codicological Analyses of Accession 1390; 35-56 (by W.B.): Mathematical School Exercises in Greek. Pabau (near Dishna), mid-third to mid-fourth century A.D.

BRASHEAR William, Wolf-Peter FUNK, James M. ROBINSON and Richard SMITH, The Chester Beatty Codex Ac. 1390. Mathematical School Exercises in Greek and John 10:7-13:38 in Subachmimic. (Chester Beatty Monographs. 13.)
Leuven - Paris, Peeters, 1990, 8Â°, vi-137 pp., 1 pl. en front. ISBN 90-6831-340-1.
